name: LOCAL 730, UNITED ASSOCIATION OF JOURNEYMEN AND APPRENTICES OF the PLUMBING AND PIPE FITTING INDUSTRY, et al. v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, UNEMPLOYMENT COMPENSATION BOARD OF REVIEW and Trane Company, Appellant
name_abbreviation: Local 730, United Ass'n of Journeymen & Apprentices v. Commonwealth

parties: LOCAL 730, UNITED ASSOCIATION OF JOURNEYMEN AND APPRENTICES OF the PLUMBING AND PIPE FITTING INDUSTRY, et al. v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, UNEMPLOYMENT COMPENSATION BOARD OF REVIEW and Trane Company, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
And now this 30th day of December, 1983, it is hereby directed that the above matter is to be reargued at the April, 1984 Session of Court in Philadelphia.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
470 A.2d 110
LOCAL 730, UNITED ASSOCIATION OF JOURNEYMEN AND APPRENTICES OF the PLUMBING AND PIPE FITTING INDUSTRY, et al. v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, UNEMPLOYMENT COMPENSATION BOARD OF REVIEW and Trane Company, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 27, 1983.
Decided Dec. 30, 1983.
